content:
size 100 thread size 14 hook redrafted from 100 year old pattern this pattern was revamped on april 5th to make it easier for a more novice crocheter to make it update july 11 2009 the original old pattern is now included in the photos to the left but if you go to the blog you can click on it and make it much larger and print that part out a few people have asked to see the original as they said it was hard to follow on my blog as i am still editing it so i am enclosing this but trust me the old version is harder to read **if you like my blog and the free patterns and tutorials and want to say thank you i have a wish list on ravelry of patterns i would like to make
thank you in advance for being kind and
saying thank you back

love sunshine but please do not feel like you have to**
